name: demersal fish to generic market for marine fish | marine fish | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17699/documentation

This is a linking (transfering) activity which links demersal fish, to the generic market for marine fish. Demersal fish includes all non-target fish species that are captured during the fishing of hake. As they have a market value they are linked to the market for marine fish through this linking activity.

The activity starts with the reception of landed hake by-catch.

The activity models the part of demersal fish which contributes to the generic market for marine fish.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/03:Fishing and aquaculture/031:Fishing/0311:Marine fishing
